content.query:
--CREATE DATABASE nyctaxi
--GO

USE nyctaxi;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ds_public_tripfare
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://dowtz3m4xrbmjf44poc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/'
)
GO
--DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delimited_public_tripfare  
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delimited_public_tripfare  
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,  
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2, 
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True,
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
          )
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA nyc
GO
--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE nyc.public_tripfare
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc.public_tripfare (medallion varchar(100),
	hack_license varchar(100),
    vendor_id varchar(100),
    pickup_datetime varchar(100),
    payment_type varchar(100),
    fare_amount varchar(100),
    surcharge varchar(100),	
    mta_tax	varchar(100),
    tip_amount varchar(100),
    tolls_amount varchar(100),	
    total_amount varchar(100)
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = ds_public_tripfare, LOCATION = N'fares-data.csv',FILE_FORMAT = delimited_public_tripfare)
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM nyc.public_tripfare



CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT public_nycparquet  
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET  ,  
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.public_agg_nyc_tripfare
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.public_agg_nyc_tripfare
    WITH (
        LOCATION = '/agg',  
        DATA_SOURCE = ds_public_tripfare,  
        FILE_FORMAT = public_nycparquet  
)
    AS SELECT 
    vendor_id
    ,hack_license
    ,SUM(CAST(fare_amount AS FLOAT)) fare_amount
    ,SUM(CAST(total_amount AS float)) total_amount
    FROM nyc.public_tripfare
    GROUP BY 
    vendor_id
    ,hack_license


SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.public_agg_nyc_tripfare
